title: Bare land, development, close to a great surfing beach - LIP 125
details: LIP-125 A land with 30 perches, ready to be developed only 50m from the main road and walking distance to a beautiful swimming beach with Midgame and Welhegoda surfing beaches only 2.5 km in either direction. The land is flat, square in shape and slightly elevated with a good boundary and access road. This property is conveniently located with all amenities readily available in the nearby towns.
